title: Assur Archive 47
description: In a private house in fC8I, excavators discovered a small archive of 7 clay tablets. Available datings range from 762 to postcanonical 622* BC. The archive, belonging to a family of tanners, consists of purchase documents, a juridical settlement, and two documents concerning inheritance.

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Assur on the basis of Peders√©n 1987 Plan(s) 62.
properties.title: Plan location of Assur Archive 47
